meta.article_title: September 14, 2015 - Do You Have the Blocking Reachies?

causes_communes: You have no choice but to reach if your feet are anchored to the ground.
If you wait to see if you have to move, you're wasting time.

debutant: So be light on your feet. Weight should be toward the front inside part of the feet.

exercices_complementaires.description: Imagine a ball coming to you to your right or left, and practice stepping to it to block.

metriques_progression: Cover the entire table with a single step in either direction
erreurs_a_eviter: Don't rush; in most cases you have more time than you think.
